api_list.name: Create
api_list.description:
Create Crypto Wallet
Simply get request to the desired chain 
EX: https://crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/{blockchain}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
